title: Where the City Is Your Backyard.
posting_body: ['Welcome to gracious living in the grand European tradition in the heart of upbeat, downtown Los Angeles, offering skyline views of one of Americas most dynamic cities.', 'Eleven distinctive floor plans that were creatively designed and crafted with a wealth of detail giving you the perfect setting for your luxurious California lifestyle.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Mail Room with Package Acceptance Services', '-Concierge Services', '-Free Reserved & Guest Gated Subterranean Parking', '-Eight (Category 5 Speed) Phone Line Capability', '-Crown Moldings', "-Separate Men's and Women's Private Dry Saunas and Steam Rooms", '-Pilates Equipment', '-Executive Business Center', '-Floor-to-Ceiling Mirrors', '-Beautiful Panoramic City Views from Many Vantage Points', '-Light, Airy Interiors with Nine Foot Ceilings', '-24-Hour Doorman', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '1221 W. 3rd St., Los Angeles, CA 90017', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
